lenya:meta.dc:description: Abstract that can be used on an overview page

xhtml:body.xhtml:p: Welcome to the default Lenya publication!
The purpose of this publication is

xhtml:ul.xhtml:li: to show beginners the basic functionality of the Lenya CMS,
to provide an "out of the box" publication that can be easily adapted and used, and
to provide a basis for reference implementations of new concepts and best practices.

xhtml:body.xhtml:p: You won't find any fancy and confusing bells and whistles here, but the publication contains everything you need to get started.
